alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 1:09PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Butte County through 145 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Northwest Inl to near Arco. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwest Inl, Butte City and Howe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. Theis type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
